Groups::GetGroupByIdGroup (  $  idGroup  ) 
 

Gets the Group which property TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_IDGROUP has the value $idGroup

Parameters:
$idGroup the id of the Group to be looked for
Returns:
- the Group object which property TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_IDGROUP has the value $idGroup

- an Errors object in case of error(s) :

GroupError::GROUP_NOT_LOADED if Group has not been loaded from the database or doesn't exist
